hero.subtitle: One platform for timeboxing, daily planning, and habit tracking. Choose the systems that work for you — not the other way around.
hero.chainCaption: Don't break the chain. Build habits that last.

features.title: Why
features.subtitle: Most productivity apps force you into one system. We let you choose.

modular.title: Modular Systems
modular.description: Enable only the systems you need. Timeboxing, habit tracking, block planning — mix and match freely.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data stays yours. Complete isolation between systems. Not even admins can access your data.

fast.title: Fast & Fluid
fast.description: Instant updates, no page reloads. Designed for speed so you can focus on what matters.

systems.title: Choose Your
systems.subtitle: Three powerful time management methods. Use one, two, or all three.

chain.title: Seinfeld Chain
chain.subtitle: Don't Break the Chain
chain.description: Build lasting habits by marking each successful day. Watch your chain grow and feel the motivation to keep it going.

timeboxing.title: Daily Timeboxing
timeboxing.subtitle: Inspired by Elon Musk
timeboxing.description: Plan every hour of your day with time blocks. Drag tasks, set priorities, and visualize your entire day at a glance.

sixblock.title: 6 Block Planner
sixblock.subtitle: Structured Simplicity
sixblock.description: Divide your day into 6 focused blocks. Add checklists, mark core priorities, and reflect on your progress.

lean.title: Lean Time Tracker
lean.subtitle: Eliminate Waste
lean.description: Categorize activities as Value, Support, or Waste. Identify patterns, eliminate low-value tasks, and maximize productivity.
